title: Family summer holiday to Spain: Villa break, resort holiday and active getaway - News & Advice - Travel
text:
One holiday, three ways. It's not too late to book a family escape abroad. We've asked three companies for their best offer on a one-week family holiday to Spain, departing in August. All prices are per person, based on two adults and two children travelling together.
Villa: Spain-Holiday.com, £213 
Includes self-catering accommodation from 22 August at the Villa La Torre in Motril, located on the Costa Tropical in Andalucia, and within walking distance from Torrenueva beach. The villa has three bedrooms, a fenced pool, and a garden with olive, banana, avocado, and cherry trees.Travel to Spain is not included. Malaga is the nearest airport (020 3384 7066; spain-holiday.com ).
Resort : Lastminute.com, £585 
Includes Ryanair flights from Stansted to Fuerteventura departing on 11 August, plus accommodation with breakfast at the five-star Hotel Geranios Suite & Spa. The hotel has indoor and outdoor pools, a children's pool, and a spa on site, as well as a beach nearby (0800 083 6000; lastminute.com ).
Active: Explore, £995 
Includes British Airways flights from Heathrow to Barcelona departing 15 August, plus accommodation with breakfast in the Pyrenean town of Sort, in Aigüestortes National Park. White-water rafting, abseiling, mountain-biking, and horse-riding are included in the price (01252 884 723; explore.co.uk ).
